As per the latest guidelines from UIDAI, only Registered Devices (RD) can be used for Aadhaar biometric authentication.
All the biometric devices used currently were classified as Public Devices. These Devices will no longer be usable for Aadhaar authentication and will be discontinued soon.
All Morpho device owners can visit https://rdserviceonline.com and register their respective devices.
Post registration, the Morpho SCL RD Service app is required to be installed for device activation.
As per the latest guidelines from UIDAI, only Registered Devices (RD) can be used for Aadhaar biometric authentication.
All the biometric devices used currently were classified as Public Devices. These Devices will no longer be usable for Aadhaar authentication and will be discontinued soon.

As per the information available, all Mantra device owners, with devices that were manufactured before April 2017, are required to visit http://servico.mantratecapp.com and register their respective devices for RD service.
Post Registration, users need to install Mantra RD service and Mantra Management Client app to proceed.
Users for rest of the devices can simply install Mantra RD service and Mantra Management Client apps and get their device registered.
The apps mentioned above need to be installed before you can continue to the next step.
Please contact your device manufacturer for more information.
